text:
Oh, Producer!
I was just reading the fan letters I received!

Today, I got a big box full of them...!
I thought I'd write replies while I have time...

That's thoughtful of you.
But don't overdo it, okay?

Thanks!
But I'm not pushing myself too hard!

Look at this one...
They just got to know me through this job.

It's so nice that they
wrote to me right away...!

I want to work in more places and
have more people know about us...!

...Yeah,
let's work hard together to get more jobs!
